planning:
b. Move toward closest goal.
· If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
· Do not stop on Maelstrom.
action: If at cargo destination, deliver it. If cargo is illegal ship suffers 2 damage.
If no free job slots, buy a cargo card. Otherwise, buy a job card and place a goal token on card's destination.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. If at job destination, complete it.
c. Reveal the lowest-rank face-down contact token on your planet, and gain this contact as a crew member for free.
